creator: Bible Study Fellowship
descriptionHtml:
Starting a Bible study shouldn’t be difficult. You need a tool that can make in-depth Bible study flexible and accessible. Something with great resources and training.

We can help…

Our content, created and edited by our network of trusted scholars, can help you establish a daily rhythm of verse-by-verse Bible study. Our training resources can give you everything you need to start a group, run a group, and grow as a group.


- THE WORDGO VISION -

Life is busy.

There are so many competing demands on our time. Work, family, friends, church, it’s a never-ending battle to try to make everything fit.

So, should we allow our relationship with God through His Word to be pushed to the side? Compressed to a token gesture? Faded into the background? Absolutely not. As believers, we know how crucial the study of God’s Word is.

We read, He speaks, we’re transformed. That’s how it works.

WordGo has been been developed with busy people in mind. Young professionals, young parents, busy students, they all have one thing in common: they are time-poor.

So, how can help those people?

Through WordGo, we’ve taken the core components of effective Bible study and simply put them in an app. You decide how much time you can afford per day and the app delivers the appropriate amount of content for the day. You read the text of the Bible, you meditate on it, you receive trusted teaching and guidance on it. And at the end of the week, you get together with your friends to share, encourage, learn and be inspired. We want you to get into the Bible. And stay in it...That’s the vision...


- HOW DOES IT WORK? -

1. Read the Bible
2. Answer guiding questions
3. Read study notes
4. Gather for discussion


- WHAT'S INCLUDED? -

Training:
From blogs to training videos, we’ve got everything you need to confidently start a WordGo group.

A Daily Plan:
Establish a sustainable daily rhythm. Studies show that a little study every day is by far the most effective approach.

Audio resources:
Take your morning run, gym session or train journey to the next level with the WordGo Podcast and audio resources.

Flexibility:
You decide how much time you can afford every day. The app sends you the appropriate amount of study content.

Reminders:
Study when you want. Pick a time and the app will remind you when to get started.

Community:
Beat procrastination and isolation by gathering with your WordGo group. Share, listen and encourage.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We're always looking for ways to make your experience better. We squashed some annoying bugs that were causing issues when returning to the app.

title: WordGo

creator: Bible Study Fellowship
descriptionHtml:
Start a Group Bible study

The WordGo app is a free Bible study resource by Bible Study Fellowship that makes it easy for anyone to start and facilitate a group Bible study.

Starting a Bible study shouldn’t be difficult. You need a tool that can make in-depth Bible study flexible and accessible. Something with great resources and training.

We can help…

Our content, created and edited by our network of trusted scholars, can help you establish a daily rhythm of verse-by-verse Bible study. Our training resources can give you everything you need to start, run and grow a group Bible study .

WordGo is a great fit for any number of contexts. Church small groups, college ministry, worship teams, or simply a way to gather friends, family, neighbors or colleagues around God’s Word.


HOW WORDGO WORKS?


The WordGo app makes it really easy for anyone to start and lead a Bible study anywhere and at any time. Everything you need is right in the app: daily Scripture reading, study questions, study notes, audio Bible teaching, and logistics support like scheduling and meeting location to invite others. This experience culminates in a group gathering (either online or in person) where groups have an opportunity to encourage one another, discuss what they’re learning, and pray together.

To get started simply pick a short-course from the WordGo study library and then invite your friends to join your group Bible study. Then:

Read the Scripture
Answer guiding questions
Listen to the audio teaching
Dive deeper with study notes
Gather with your group for discussion

The WordGo Vision

When it comes to studying the Bible many of us struggle. It can be difficult to know where to begin and how to keep going. We all have good intentions but the reality is … Life is busy.

There are so many competing demands on our time. Work, family, friends, church, it’s a never-ending battle to try to make everything fit. WordGo has been developed with busy people in mind.

We’ve taken the core components of effective Bible study and simply put them in an app. You decide how much time you can afford per day and the app delivers the right amount of content for the day. You read the text of the Bible, you meditate on it, you receive trusted teaching and guidance on it. And at the end of the week, you get together with your friends to share, encourage, learn and be inspired. We want you to get into the Bible. And stay in it...That’s the vision…


WHAT’S INCLUDED?

Training:
From blogs to training videos, we’ve got everything you need to confidently start and facilitate a WordGo group.

A Daily Plan:
Establish a sustainable daily rhythm. Studies show that a little study every day is by far the most effective approach.

Audio resources:
Take your morning run, gym session or train journey to the next level with WordGo’s audio resources.

Flexibility:
You decide how much time you can afford every day. The app sends you the right amount of study content.

Reminders:
Study when you want. Pick a time and the app will remind you when to get started.

Community:
Beat procrastination and isolation by gathering with your WordGo group. Share, listen and encourage.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're always working hard to improve your experience. In this release we've added a ton of new features and fixed some annoying bugs. Here's a small preview:
- You're now able to be in multiple groups.
- All new profile tab to manage your notification settings, study preferences and groups.
- New tools for Group Guides to help you manage your group's meeting schedule.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added a new Your Notes area to the Profile tab so you can view all of your notes from past and current studies.
- Added the ability to set up group intro-gatherings. Intro-gatherings are a great way for you and your group members to get to know each other before you start using WordGo.
- Added guest access. You can now look through the course library, browse the lessons and view the daily content without setting up a WordGo account or group.
- We also squashed some annoying bugs.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this release we've fixed some bugs and added an awesome new Inbox feature to the Profile tab.

title: WordGo

creator: Bible Study Fellowship
descriptionHtml:
Personal and group Bible study made simple
Scripture, questions, study notes and audio teaching delivered to your phone daily.

WordGo by Bible Study Fellowship is a free Bible study resource, designed to make in-depth Bible study flexible and accessible. Our content, created by Bible Study Fellowship’s network of trusted scholars, can help you establish a daily rhythm of verse-by-verse Bible study.

Our Bible courses range from 2 to 6 weeks and our growing course library includes studies in Genesis, Joshua, Ruth, 1 Kings, John, Acts, 1 Corinthians, Thessalonians, Hebrews, James and 1 Peter.

HOW WORDGO WORKS

To get started simply pick a short-course and decide if you want to study solo or invite your friends to join your group Bible study. Then:

Read the Scripture
Answer guiding questions
Dive deeper with study notes
Listen to trusted audio teaching

If studying as part of a group, this experience culminates in a group gathering (either online or in person) where members have an opportunity to encourage one another, discuss what they’re learning, and pray together.

WordGo has members in over 120 countries and is used in many contexts; personal Bible study, church small groups, college ministry, worship teams, family Bible study and friends gathering together around God’s Word.


“...we think we’ve found a way for you to get into the Bible...and stay in it...”


Visit wordgo.org to learn more.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We're always working to make your experience better. In this release we knocked out some bugs, updated some UI and added a new individual study feature.

In this release we've included the following:

title: WordGo: Start a Bible Study

creator: Bible Study Fellowship
descriptionHtml:
Study the Bible with WordGo
Scripture, questions, study notes, and audio teaching delivered to your phone daily.

WordGo by Bible Study Fellowship is a free Bible study resource, designed to help you get into the Bible, and stay in it. Our content, created by Bible Study Fellowship’s network of trusted scholars, can help you establish a daily rhythm of verse-by-verse Bible study.

Our Bible courses range from 1 to 6 weeks and our growing course library includes studies in Genesis, Joshua, Ruth, 1 Kings, John, Acts, 1 Corinthians, Thessalonians, Hebrews, James, 1 Peter, Revelations and many more.

HOW WORDGO WORKS
To get started simply pick a short-course and choose if you want to study solo or invite your friends to join your group Bible study. Then:

Read the Scripture
Answer guiding questions
Dive deeper with study notes
Listen to trusted audio teaching

WordGo has members in over 150 countries and is used in many contexts; personal Bible study, church small groups, college ministry, worship teams, family Bible study and friends gathering together around God’s Word.

SOLO USERS
Customize your Bible study experience; select how long you want to study for each day and set daily study reminders
Write and save your private notes in the app
Change your course at anytime

GROUPS
Invite family and friends to join your group Bible study
Meet in person or online
Share your group guide role with another member in your group
Access resources and training to help you guide your group

CHURCHES
Designed with small groups in mind
Supports discipleship and fosters community
Content written by Bible Study Fellowship’s network of trusted scholars
Church resources available to promote WordGo groups in your church


CONNECT WITH WORDGO

Join the WordGo community on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter

Visit wordgo.org to learn more.

“...we think we’ve found a way for you to get into the Bible...and stay in it...”

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Knocked out some bug fixes.

Listen to trusted audio teaching

WordGo has members in over 150 countries and is used in many contexts; personal Bible study, church small groups, college ministry, worship teams, family Bible study and friends gathering together around God’s Word.

SOLO USERS
Customize your Bible study experience; select how long you want to study for each day and set daily study reminders
Write and save your private notes in the app
Change your course at anytime

GROUPS
Invite family and friends to join your group Bible study
Meet in person or online
Share your group guide role with another member in your group
Access resources and training to help you guide your group

CHURCHES
Designed with small groups in mind
Supports discipleship and fosters community
Content written by Bible Study Fellowship’s network of trusted scholars
Church resources available to promote WordGo groups in your church


CONNECT WITH WORDGO

Join the WordGo community on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter

Visit wordgo.org to learn more.

“...we think we’ve found a way for you to get into the Bible...and stay in it...”

WordGo by Bible Study Fellowship is a free Bible study resource, designed to help you get into the Bible, and stay in it. Our content, created by Bible Study Fellowship’s network of trusted scholars, can help you establish a daily rhythm of verse-by-verse Bible study.
